mapper.insert: insert into deployment ( mode, node_id, node_name, node_ip, node_port, root_path, central_node_ip, central_node_port, central_node_root_path ) values ( #{mode}, #{nodeId}, #{nodeName}, #{nodeIp}, #{nodePort}, #{rootPath}, #{centralNodeIp}, #{centralNodePort}, #{centralNodeRootPath} )
mapper.select: select mode, node_id as nodeId, node_name as nodeName, node_ip as nodeIp, node_port as nodePort, root_path as rootPath, central_node_ip as centralNodeIp, central_node_port as centralNodePort, central_node_root_path as centralNodeRootPath from deployment
